plot: The 24-year-old boxer Nick gets a chance to fight himself to a professional boxing contract, supported by his eager coach. But when his best friend Palle gets into trouble Nick is faced with a choice between his dreams and cold reality.
title: Bokseren
plot_es: The 24-year-old boxer Nick gets a chance to fight himself to a professional boxing contract, supported by his eager coach. But when his best friend Palle gets into trouble Nick is faced with a choice between his dreams and cold reality.
plot_en: The 24-year-old boxer Nick gets a chance to fight himself to a professional boxing contract, supported by his eager coach. But when his best friend Palle gets into trouble Nick is faced with a choice between his dreams and cold reality.
